```{r setup}
library(ussie)
library(dplyr)
```

ussie helps you work with European football data from the engsoccerdata package
by cleaning and manipulating the data into more useful forms.

```{r}
germany <- uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::germany, "Germany")

glimpse(germany)
```
